00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * Utility functions for endian swapping
00044  *
00045  * <hr>$Revision: 32636 $<hr>
00046  */
00047 
00048 #ifndef __CVMX_SWAP_H__
00049 #define __CVMX_SWAP_H__
00050 
00051 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00052 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00053 extern "C" {
00054 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 /**
00058  * Byte swap a 16 bit number
00059  *
00060  * @param x      16 bit number
00061  * @return Byte swapped result
00062  */
00063 static inline uint16_t cvmx_swap16(uint16_t x)
00064 {
00065     return ((uint16_t) ((((uint16_t) (x) & (uint16_t) 0x00ffU) << 8) | (((uint16_t) (x) & (uint16_t) 0xff00U) >> 8)));
00066 }
00067 
00068 /**
00069  * Byte swap a 32 bit number
00070  *
00071  * @param x      32 bit number
00072  * @return Byte swapped result
00073  */ static inline uint32_t cvmx_swap32(uint32_t x)
00074 {
00075     return ((uint32_t) ((((uint32_t) (x) & (uint32_t) 0x000000ffUL) << 24) |
00076                 (((uint32_t) (x) & (uint32_t) 0x0000ff00UL) << 8) |
00077                 (((uint32_t) (x) & (uint32_t) 0x00ff0000UL) >> 8) | (((uint32_t) (x) & (uint32_t) 0xff000000UL) >> 24)));
00078 }
00079 
00080 /**
00081  * Byte swap a 64 bit number
00082  *
00083  * @param x      64 bit number
00084  * @return Byte swapped result
00085  */
00086 static inline uint64_t cvmx_swap64(uint64_t x)
00087 {
00088     return ((x >> 56) |
00089         (((x >> 48) & 0xfful) << 8) |
00090         (((x >> 40) & 0xfful) << 16) |
00091         (((x >> 32) & 0xfful) << 24) | (((x >> 24) & 0xfful) << 32) | (((x >> 16) & 0xfful) << 40) | (((x >> 8) & 0xfful) << 48) | (((x >> 0) & 0xfful) << 56));
00092 }
00093 
00094 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00095 
00096 #define cvmx_cpu_to_le16(x) cvmx_swap16(x)
00097 #define cvmx_cpu_to_le32(x) cvmx_swap32(x)
00098 #define cvmx_cpu_to_le64(x) cvmx_swap64(x)
00099 
00100 #define cvmx_cpu_to_be16(x) (x)
00101 #define cvmx_cpu_to_be32(x) (x)
00102 #define cvmx_cpu_to_be64(x) (x)
00103 
00104 #else
00105 
00106 #define cvmx_cpu_to_le16(x) (x)
00107 #define cvmx_cpu_to_le32(x) (x)
00108 #define cvmx_cpu_to_le64(x) (x)
00109 
00110 #define cvmx_cpu_to_be16(x) cvmx_swap16(x)
00111 #define cvmx_cpu_to_be32(x) cvmx_swap32(x)
00112 #define cvmx_cpu_to_be64(x) cvmx_swap64(x)
00113 
00114 #endif
00115 
00116 #define cvmx_le16_to_cpu(x) cvmx_cpu_to_le16(x)
00117 #define cvmx_le32_to_cpu(x) cvmx_cpu_to_le32(x)
00118 #define cvmx_le64_to_cpu(x) cvmx_cpu_to_le64(x)
00119 
00120 #define cvmx_be16_to_cpu(x) cvmx_cpu_to_be16(x)
00121 #define cvmx_be32_to_cpu(x) cvmx_cpu_to_be32(x)
00122 #define cvmx_be64_to_cpu(x) cvmx_cpu_to_be64(x)
00123
